answers.a: a.A mechanism to acquire all the properties of the child object
answers.b: b.A mechanism by which one object acquires all the properties and behaviors of parent object
answers.c: c.A mechanism to restrict access to class members
answers.d: d.A mechanism to declare multiple methods with the same name

questions.question: 2.Which keyword is used to describe inheritance in Java?

answers.a: a.A parent-child or a super class-subclass relationship
answers.d: d.A relationship between methods and variables
